title: Easily the most toxic game ive ever played in my life.

replies.body: You seem to speak about a punishment, do you want to share your reform card with us (readers)?
I dont have a recent one, i havent argued/instigated anything since my last chat restriction. Was around 3 months ago.
Hands down. F2P Shooters are less toxic than this game but that's because they actually punish toxic players. Not slap them on the wrist and give them a little break to grab some food and drink.
